page.title: 12MARCHAM COLTS FC
page.content:
{GROUNDS} The football ground is owned by the Parish Council. It is one of two grounds in Marcham. One is for the men's football and the other is for the boys'. The mens' ground also has a cricket pitch next to it.
{AGES} The ages have quite a big difference between them.For the boys there is under 10's,under 12's and under 15's. Men's age group is under 21's.
{LEAGUES} The league they play in is called the North Berks League. All age groups from under 10's to under 16's compete against teams in that area.
